name: HOT GIRLS VR
description:
Welcome to the palace full of beautiful, hot girls, meet them all,
play with them at the party and meet with each of them.

You can choose one of four locations where the girl is alone with you
or you can have fun with all the girls in the palace.

All four girls love to dance, see how beautiful they can move.

During experience you can control the time. Slow down the animation or stop it absolutely.

Experience amazing moments in Virtual Reality using HTC Vive or Oculus Rift!

Locations:

- Tropical Island
- Black stage
- Office room
- White stage
- Palace

Features:

- slow down or stop animation
- unique music
- visiting the palace
- girls model
- different types of dance
- Game designed for HTC VIVE or OCULUS RIFT
